metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14260 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: In the SDK in Bento4 1.5.0-616, the AP4_StssAtom class in Ap4StssAtom.cpp contains a Write Memory Access Violation vulnerability. It is possible to exploit this vulnerability and possibly execute arbitrary code by opening a crafted .MP4 file.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
